```{r Appendix A, echo = F, message = F, warning = F, results='asis'}
good_species <- read.csv("../results/good_species.csv")

string = c()
fig_num <- 1
for (ispp in unique(good_species$taxon)){
 string = paste0(string,
                 "![](../figures/Appendix_A/VAST_output_", ispp, ".png)\n",
                 "Appendix A", fig_num, ": VAST output for ", ispp, 
                 ". A) Predicted density with observed densities superimposed,",
                 " B) Abundance Indices with coefficients of variation, and ",
                 "C) QQ plot.", "\n\n<br>\n\n")
 
 fig_num <- fig_num + 1
}

cat(string)
```
